name: Simon... But Deadly
description:
Do your best to memorize the color pattern and play it back by double-jumping and wall-hopping from color to color. Each round adds another color to the pattern. The floor is removed until the sequence is successfully repeated so one wrong color or missed jump means certain death. See how long you can last!

Music:    Abstraction - Three Red Hearts - Princess Quest

https://tallbeard.itch.io/three-red-hearts-prepare-to-dev

http://www.abstractionmusic.com/
